attributes.action: honour his pledge in Maternity Matters and provide a local maternity facility in the town of Newbury.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The population in West Berkshire is set to increase by 20%, yet there is still no plan to provide a maternity facility in the town.
Your own Government guarantees in its Maternity Matters policy that women should have access to a local midwifery facility, so we ask you to fulfill this pledge and give women access to a local birth centre here in Newbury.  Women should not be faced with a stressful journey to Reading, Oxford or Basingstoke; a journey that is made worse in peak travel times or in poor weather conditions.
